column2: Winery Tour w/ ESN

column6:
Hey there, Erasmus people!!! Are you ready to try something new and typical? Are you interested in discovering more about wine tourism of our city? So, Ferrari Winery is the right place for you!

Remember that Ferrari is one of the over 50 producers of Trentodoc,
traditional method sparkling wines, made with grapes growing in the
mountains of the surrounding area of Trento since more than one century.
Check out [url=http://www.trentodoc.com/en/]www.trentodoc.com/en/[/url] for more info
